lyrics:
35 contributorsyoung  sad lyricsintro billy ray cyrus
hey bud this is ol dad
just wanted you to know you aint alone
keep a smile on your face everythings gonna be fine
i love you

verse 1
they say you should smile more
darlin show your eyes more
arent you satisfied
im tired of tryna please some
one who doesnt even
care whats on my mind

prechorus
let me go i dont need you to wipe my tears
dont you know im only tryin to disappear

chorus
dont wanna be young and sad another day longer
dont wanna feel numb or mad until i go under
and i know that you only want me to be happy
but i still feel lonely tonight
dont wanna be young and sad another day longer
another day longer
you might also likeverse 2
my sisters like sunshine
always bringing good light
wherever she will go
and i was born to rain clouds
when they blew the flame out
blessed in her shadow

prechorus
so let me go i dont need you to wipe my tears
dont you know im only tryin to disappear

chorus
dont wanna be young and sad another day longer
dont wanna feel numb or mad until i go under
and i know that you only want me to be happy
but i still feel lonely tonight
dont wanna be young and sad another day longer
another day longer hey

outro
dont wanna be young and sad yeah
dont wanna be young and sad
dont wanna be young and sad yeah
dont wanna be young and sad another day longer
dont wanna feel numb or mad until i go under27embed
